about_the_game:
As a Spellhacker, there's no job too hard - just those that don't pay enough. In a world of megacorps and lethal magic, you'll do anything for your clients to survive...

SPELLHACK!! is a tactical roguelike deckbuilder that combines elements of tower defense and survival games. During the day, visit locations in Doom City to manipulate the spells in your Spelldrive. At night, ward off the hordes of Summoned Beasts under real-time pressure!!

Craft Your Spelldrive: Unleash potent technospell combinations in fast-paced tactical gameplay. You'll need to think fast at night, but having strong synergies between your spells is equally important.

Defend the Portal: A variety of Summoned Beasts have been sent to destroy the portal! If Beasts destroy your Portal, the job will be delayed and the client won't be happy. Thankfully, your overall progress on the gig will remain intact. In Story Mode, the longer you can survive, the faster you'll progress!

Explore Doom City: Even during daytime, the City holds some truly sinister sights. Your options expand as you progress along your mission, and as you learn the city's secrets, you'll realize which neighborhood is mostly likely to provide what you need.

Uncover the Mystery: There may be more to this game than it seems...

This demo includes the complete game loop, and a full run that is shorter than in the final version. Only 1 of 6 locations in Doom City can be scanned, and there is a limited pool of Technospells available.
